'' Setting colors in grid on Part properties : state, classification
Dim i As Integer
For i=0 To Me.getItemCount()-1
Dim bg_color_state As String Dim bg_color_classification As String Dim bg_color_production_state As String Dim myCss As String
Dim thisItem As Item = Me.getItemByIndex(i) Dim thisStatus As String = thisItem.getProperty("state","") Dim thisClassification as String = thisItem.getProperty("classification","")
'------ Select (thisStatus)
Case "Preliminary" bg_color_state = "" 'none 'bg_color_state = "#ffb6c1" 'baby Pink Case "In Review" bg_color_state = "" 'none 'bg_color_state = "#FFA500" 'light Orange Case "Approved" bg_color_state = "" 'none 'bg_color_state = "#FFFFBB" 'light yellow Case "Released" bg_color_state = "" 'none 'bg_color_state = "#99CC33" 'light green Case "Superseded","Obsolete" bg_color_state = "" 'none 'bg_color_state = "#FFBBBB" 'light red Case Else bg_color_state = "" 'none End Select
Select (thisClassification) Case "Part" bg_color_classification = "" 'none 'bg_color_classification = "#66CCFF" ' "#77CCFF" 'light blue Case "Customer Variant" bg_color_classification = "" 'none 'bg_color_classification = "#0099FF" ' "#668AFF" 'darker light blue Case Else bg_color_classification = "" 'none End Select
If bg_color_state <> "" or bg_color_classification <> "" Then myCss = ".state { background-color: " & bg_color_state & " }" myCss &= ".classification { background-color: " & bg_color_classification & "; }" 'myCss &= ".classification { background-color: " & bg_color_classification & "; text-indent: 5px;}" thisItem.setProperty("css",myCss)
End If Next i Return Me
Item.name: SRE_SetClassColors
